message: Let's start with a fair split, I'll take 90% and you get 10%. We can adjust later if needed.
You took 90% in the first round, I'll take 70% now. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to go down to 60%, but I think we can both do better than a 30/70 split. Let's find a middle ground.
You're willing to go to 60%, I'll meet you halfway at 55% for me. Your turn to think about it!
